text: Photo credit : INSTARImages'' Kendall and Ben had a late dinner at Craig's with a group of friends, includingand, a source told. ` ` They had a big table and they were all hanging out having a great time together. They had a ton of food, drinks and dessert and it was a long dinner. Kendall was very happy with Ben, whispering and giggling the entire night. After dinner, their friends all went out the front door and Kendall and Ben snuck out the back. They got into a waiting Rolls Royce and Ben drove them off.''
